import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' IMP const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title,city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews} = tour; return (
Featured
{city } {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
); }; export default TourCard;
